### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are within the valid range. In this case, the offshore pump and boiler are too far apart to connect with a pipe.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to power connections
- Make sure that all energy-producing entities (like steam engines) are connected to a power network to avoid "not connected to power network" warnings.

### Errors when entities have no input or output
- Check that all entities requiring input (like boilers) have the necessary connections and fluids available to function properly.

### Errors when picking up pipes
- Be cautious when picking up pipes that are part of a fluid system. Ensure that you are not disrupting necessary connections.
